OCLibrary

Core definitions, macros, and types for the OCTypes library.

This header centralizes the core types and helper macros used throughout the OCTypes framework, and then includes all the public OCTypes APIs.

Defines

__private_extern__
struct OCRange
#include <OCLibrary.h>

A structure representing a contiguous byte or element range.

Public Members

uint64_t location

Start index of the range.

uint64_t length

Number of elements in the range.
